hero.title: UUGPT Makes Multi-Model AI Conversations More Efficient
hero.subtitleLine1: Integrates GPT, Gemini, Claude, and more models
hero.subtitleLine3: Unified access on mobile & PC, no VPN needed, direct connection in mainland China.

multiModel.title: Multi-Model AI Conversations
multiModel.desc: Easily switch between GPT, Gemini, Claude, and more models, covering academic writing, programming assistance, and creative generation, all in one platform to meet your diverse needs.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.desc: Uses HTTPS encryption, cloud storage for chat records with the option to delete. Anonymous users leave no trace after clearing cookies, ensuring your privacy and data security.

flexiblePricing.title: Flexible Pricing + First Month Discount
flexiblePricing.desc: Offers free, basic, and premium plans. New users pay only $1 for the first month, allowing you to experience UUGPT's powerful features at a very low cost.

cloudStorage.title: Cloud Storage
cloudStorage.desc: Chat records are stored in the cloud, accessible across devices, preventing data loss and allowing you to view and manage anytime, anywhere.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal Features
multiModal.desc: Supports sending images, PDFs, txt, Word, and other formats, meeting more scenario requirements and enhancing communication efficiency.

intelligentSearch.title: Intelligent Search
intelligentSearch.desc: UUGPT can be integrated into third-party search engines for AI-driven search, helping you quickly locate key information.

reviewer1.name: Jondier Junior
reviewer1.comment: â€œThe multi-model switching in UUGPT is really convenient, and the first month discount is such a great deal. I recommended it to my friends, and they all love it!â€

reviewer2.name: Paul Edison
reviewer2.comment: â€œThe options from anonymous to premium are very flexible. Cloud storage and encryption methods make me feel secure, definitely recommend.â€

reviewer3.name: Erik Bass
reviewer3.comment: â€œThe interface is clean, and the response speed is fast, especially in mainland China with no lag. Itâ€™s really helpful for me, as I need to communicate across languages.â€

cta.title: Experience UUGPT Now
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users and experience more efficient and convenient AI conversation management, easily tackling learning, work, and creative scenarios!

footer.seoText: Multi-Model AI Conversations, GPT, Gemini, Claude, 21 Languages Support, Cloud Storage, Encrypted Security, Flexible Pricing, Direct Connection in Mainland China, AI-assisted Writing, Creative Generation, Programming Assistance, AIGC

login.title: Login to uuGPT
login.emailPlaceholder: Login or register with your email
login.emailFormatError: Please enter a valid email address
login.emailError: Please enter a valid email address
login.invalidPasswordCharacterError: Contains illegal characters, only letters and numbers are allowed
login.passwordLengthError: The length must be between 6 and 24 characters
login.agreeTerms: I agree to the uuGPT Terms of Service
login.agreeTermsError: Please agree to the agreement first
login.forgotPasswordError: The forgot password function is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
login.forgotSuccess: A password reset email has been sent. Please check your email for instructions on resetting your password.
login.enterVerificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code sent to {{email}}. It is valid for 5 minutes.
login.verificationCodeSentSuccess: Verification code sent. Please check your email.
login.invalidVerificationCodeError: Please enter a valid verification code
login.setPasswordText: Please set your login password. Use 6-24 characters.
login.resetPasswordText: Please set a new login password. Use 6-24 characters.

app.title: uuGPT
app.imageSaveHint: This image will expire in 60 minutes. Right-click and save as!
app.linkError: Server connection error. Please try again.
app.noMoreTokens: You do not have enough tokens.
app.promotion: Unlimited Annual Plan for only ${{yearPrice}} per year. Save ${{yearDiscount}}!
app.deleteToTheEnd: Delete this message and all subsequent messages

aisystem: Respond in English. Answers must use Markdown format. Only when the answer is complex or requires references, include 1-3 authoritative reference links at the end that are directly relevant and verified sources. Links must be genuine and strongly related to the topic. Simple answers should omit citations entirely.

pricing.choosePlanDescription: Select the most suitable plan for your needs and enjoy powerful AI services.
pricing.planDescription: Your plan determines the AI services and features you can access.
freePlanFeatures: Limited daily access to basic models (GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku)
basicPlanFeatures: 5000 monthly model accesses (GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku)
Access to advanced models (o1-preview, Claude 3.5, Gemini 1.5 Pro)
Upcoming: file upload and voice input
proPlanFeatures: All features from Free and Basic plans
Unlimited basic model access (GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku)
pricing.priceComparisonDesc: Compared to subscribing GPT, Claude, and Gemini separately, our aggregate plan helps you save more!
pricing.priceComparisonConclusion: Pay once for multiple AI services, no need for separate subscriptions, saving you time and money!
pricing.faqQ1: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
pricing.faqA1: Yes, you can cancel or modify your plan at any time in your account settings, effective next billing cycle.
pricing.faqQ2: Do you provide invoices or receipts?
pricing.faqA2: We provide digital receipts upon each successful payment. Check your account center or contact support if needed.
pricing.paymentProcessingMessage: Please wait, your payment is being processed...
pricing.paymentFailureMessage: Payment failed. Please check your payment information and try again.
pricing.priceNote: Access GPT-4, Claude 2, and Gemini Pro with single subscription
